title: LP games in Dia Elo
body:
I'm D4, and I have an average mmr for my rank, yet my win gives me 15 lp.
Is this a bug or normal to gain low lp on Diamond Elo with average mmr?

replies.body: If you've been seeing lower and lower LP gains it might mean that your MMR and Rank are a little mismatched and you're currently ranked higher than most people with the same MMR.
